page.title: 16LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: The village Playing Field,houses the Village Football and Cricket teams, it includes a grass tennis court and various fixed amusements for younger children. A survey of the Junior children showed {home activities} as Lego building,Horse-riding,Sewing,TV,Readin g,learning a Musical Instruments, Writing Stories,Fishing,Houswork, Dancing and using a Computor. The same children gave the following as games they played at {school}, Football,Cricket,Tag,Netball,Tennis, Rounders,Jacko,Leapfrog,Donkey,Elastic and Balls;in that order of popularity.
